titleStmt.title: A very heroical epistle from my Lord All-pride to Dol-common. The argument. Dol-common being forsaken by my Lord All-pride, and having written him a most lamentable letter, his Lordship sends her the following answer.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.
Scroope, Carr, Sir, 1649-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to the Earl of Rochester by Wing.
Attributed to Sir Carr Scroope by DNB.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"Satirical verses upon the Duke of Buckingham. By Sir C. Scrope??" - Brit. mus. cat.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
